Holds a panel added to the extra tool bar that provides the ability to select a colour.

Holds a panel added to the extra tool bar that provides some options specific to the tool currently selected.

Serialized Fields

JVector parent
Holds a reference to the JVector class that initialised this dialog, so that it can notify it when its done.

Holds wether or not the dialog is finished its work. It finishes its work when the user has chosen valid settings.

Class com.terei.jvector.gui.PaintTab extends JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

jsp

JScrollPane jsp
The ScrollPane used when the canvas are is too large.

jp

JPanel jp
The actual JPanel the drawing takes place on. The canvas is setup this way, with;

JPanel -> JScrollPane -> JPanel

This is done this way due to layout issues.

SIZE_CURRENT

Point2D.Double SIZE_CURRENT
The current size of PaintCanvas, used in conjunction with SIZE_OLD to zoom in and out.

SIZE_OLD

Point2D.Double SIZE_OLD
The previous size of PaintCanvas, used in conjunction with SIZE_CURRENT to zoom in and out.

Class com.terei.jvector.paint.PaintCanvas extends JPanel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

zoomLevel

int zoomLevel
The current zoom level (in percentage) of the image.

name

String name
The name of the Image this paint canvas is holding.

width

int width
The width of the Image this paint canvas is holding.

height

int height
The height of the Image this paint canvas is holding.

file

File file
The file that this 'graphic' saves to.

saved

boolean saved
The state of this 'graphic', saved or not.

tab

PaintTab tab
The PaintTab that is holding this canvas. Needed for zoom operations.

shapes

Vector<E> shapes
Holds all the shapes that have been drawn.

tShape

Shape tShape
Holds the shape currently being drawn. The variable stands for temporary shape.

aShape

Shape aShape
Holds the active shape, the one currently selected by the selection tool, to move around and modify its properties. The variable stands for aShape.

Serialized Fields

Point p1
The starting coordinates of the line.

p1w

Point p1w
A working value for p1, used for zooming in and out so that p1 isn't modified.

See Also:
Line.p1

p2

Point p2
The enidng coordinates of the line.

p2w

Point p2w
A working value for p2, used for zooming in and out so that p2 isn't modified.

See Also:
Line.p2

color

Color color
The colour of the line.

stroke

int stroke
The stroke/width of the line.

stroked

double stroked
A working value for stroke, used for zooming in and out so that stroke isn't modified.

See Also:
Line.stroke

opacity

int opacity
The opacity of the line.
